title: FT/FS: HOF's - Commons - SL's - Mid-Tier Backs
author: Baseball*Collectibles

posts.post_title: FT/FS: HOF's - Commons - SL's - Mid-Tier Backs
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE][/STRIKE]I have the following cards available for trade/sale.  I am looking for T206's with more difficult backs: Lenox, CB, BL, Uzit.  The values are listed below, which are net to me.  If interested, please send a PM or email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] for scans etc.  Please add $2.67 for postage.

Old Mill:
Batch Old Mill SGC 35 - $50
Bender Old Mill SGC 30 - $114
Hart Old Mill SGC 45 - $112
Jennings Both Hands Old Mill SGC 20 - $108

Bump....if interested, please feel free to make an offer.

please send scans of the following cards to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]:

Bump...prices lowered on the Cobb's, and a few others.  Several new cards added.
Hey, is that Bender a portrait?
Sorry no.  It is The Bender no trees.
bump...prices lowered...sold cards removed...more added including an Evers Cycle 350 SGC 40.
